marytts.util.math
Class FloatList

java.lang.Object
  marytts.util.math.FloatList

public class FloatList
extends java.lang.Object

FloatList is used to maintain a circular buffer of float values. It is essentially an index-free array of floats that can easily be iterated through forwards or backwards. Keeping values in an index free list like this eliminates index bounds checking which can save us some time.
